glsa.title: Ekiga: Format string vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: A format string vulnerability in Ekiga may allow the remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Ekiga is an open source VoIP and video conferencing application.

description.p: Mu Security has discovered that Ekiga fails to implement formatted printing correctly.

impact.p: An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to crash Ekiga and potentially execute arbitrary code by sending a specially crafted Q.931 SETUP packet to a victim.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Ekiga users should upgrade to the latest version:
